thread.title: Huddersfield Town 3-1 Brighton & Hove Albion

author: Editor - Top Stories
title: Huddersfield Town 3-1 Brighton & Hove Albion
text:
Match ends, Huddersfield Town 3, Brighton and Hove Albion 1. Full Time 
Second Half ends, Huddersfield Town 3, Brighton and Hove Albion 1. Posted at 90’+3′ 
Attempt saved. Joe Lolley (Huddersfield Town) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Collin Quaner. Posted at 90’+1′ 
Attempt missed. Kasey Palmer (Huddersfield Town) right footed shot from outside the box is too high from a direct free kick. Posted at 90′ 
Elias Kachunga (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half. Posted at 90′ 
Foul by Glenn Murray (Brighton and Hove Albion). Posted at 89′ 
Corner, Huddersfield Town. Conceded by David Stockdale. Posted at 89′ 
Attempt saved. Kasey Palmer (Huddersfield Town) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Elias Kachunga. Posted at 88′ 
Chris Löwe (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half. Posted at 88′ 
Foul by Glenn Murray (Brighton and Hove Albion). Substitution 
Substitution, Huddersfield Town. Collin Quaner replaces Nahki Wells. Posted at 80′ 
Offside, Huddersfield Town. Aaron Mooy tries a through ball, but Nahki Wells is caught offside. Posted at 80′ 
Aaron Mooy (Huddersfield Town) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box. Assisted by Elias Kachunga. Booking 
Oliver Norwood (Brighton and Hove Albion) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul. Posted at 79′ 
Joe Lolley (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the attacking half. Posted at 79′ 
Foul by Oliver Norwood (Brighton and Hove Albion). Substitution 
Substitution, Huddersfield Town. Joe Lolley replaces Rajiv van La Parra. Posted at 77′ 
Rajiv van La Parra (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half. Posted at 77′ 
Foul by Steve Sidwell (Brighton and Hove Albion). Posted at 76′ 
Attempt saved. Kasey Palmer (Huddersfield Town) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Elias Kachunga. Posted at 75′ 
Foul by Jonathan Hogg (Huddersfield Town). Posted at 75′ 
Chuba Akpom (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick on the right wing. Posted at 74′ 
Attempt missed. Michael Hefele (Huddersfield Town) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aaron Mooy with a cross following a corner. Posted at 73′ 
Corner, Huddersfield Town. Conceded by Shane Duffy. Substitution 
Substitution, Huddersfield Town. Kasey Palmer replaces Isaiah Brown because of an injury. Posted at 71′ 
Delay over. They are ready to continue. Posted at 70′ 
Delay in match Isaiah Brown (Huddersfield Town) because of an injury. Posted at 69′ 
Jonathan Hogg (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half. Posted at 69′ 
Foul by Chuba Akpom (Brighton and Hove Albion). Posted at 68′ 
Delay over. They are ready to continue. Posted at 67′ 
Delay in match Isaiah Brown (Huddersfield Town) because of an injury. Dismissal 
Second yellow card to Lewis Dunk (Brighton and Hove Albion) for a bad foul. Posted at 66′ 
Isaiah Brown (Huddersfield Town) wins a free kick in the defensive half. Posted at 66′ 
Foul by Lewis Dunk (Brighton and Hove Albion). Substitution 
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Chuba Akpom replaces Tomer Hemed. Substitution 
Substitution, Brighton and Hove Albion. Solly March replaces Jamie Murphy. Posted at 62′ 
Attempt missed. Nahki Wells (Huddersfield Town) left footed shot from the left side of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Aaron Mooy. Posted at 61′ 
Foul by Nahki Wells (Huddersfield Town). Posted at 61′ 
Sébastien Pocognoli (Brighton and Hove Albion) wins a free kick in the defensive half. Posted at 56′ 
Corner, Huddersfield Town. Conceded by David Stockdale. Show more updates
